official_title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1970 to include the possible prevention of loss of life among the factors to be considered in evaluating the benefits of proposed water resource projects.

summary.text: Amends the Flood Control Act of 1970 to include the possible prevention of the loss of life among the factors to be considered in evaluating the benefits of federally financed water resource projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Flood Control Act of 1970 to include the possible prevention of loss of life among the factors to be considered in evaluating the benefits of proposed water resource projects.
